law.catch_line: Gubernatorial appointments to Prescription Monitoring Program Compact.
law.text: The Governor shall be the appointing authority for those appointments Kentucky is entitled to make under KRS 218A.390, provided that all such appointments shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.
law.history: Created 2012 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 13, effective July 20, 2012.
